## ðŸš€ Star Search

Welcome to *Star Search*! 

Here, you're able to search your favorite Star Wars characters in realtime leveraging [Algolia](https://www.algolia.com/)

This experience is built off of the [Gatsby Default Starter](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-default)

### To Run:

`npm install`

`npm start`

To rebuild the Algolia index:
Set up a [Algolia Index](https://www.algolia.com/doc/api-client/getting-started/instantiate-client-index/?language=javascript#init-index) here!  
Once this is done, use
`npm build` to set up your index
